meta.title: Paxi Technologies - Reliable IT Services for Growing Businesses
meta.description: Reliable IT support, project management, and consulting services for small and mid-sized businesses. We provide dependable IT services without enterprise complexity.

hero.title: Reliable IT Services for Growing Businesses
hero.subtitle: We provide the IT support, project management, and consulting services your business needs to operate smoothly and grow confidently.

about.title: About Paxi Technologies
about.subtitle: We're committed to providing reliable IT services that help small and mid-sized businesses operate smoothly and grow confidently. Our approach is straightforward, accountable, and designed for businesses like yours.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We use this form to route inquiries to the correct team. Select the subject that best matches your request and provide a brief message. We review all inquiries and respond during normal business hours.
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below with your information and inquiry. We'll review your message and respond during normal business hours.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

itSupport.title: Reliable IT Support That Keeps Your Business Running
itSupport.subtitle: Ongoing technical support for your computers, networks, and systems. Keeps your technology running smoothly so your business can operate without interruption.

itProjectManagement.title: IT Project Management That Delivers Results
itProjectManagement.subtitle: Expert project management for your IT initiatives. Ensures your projects are completed on time, within budget, and meet your business objectives.

itConsulting.title: IT Consulting That Helps You Make Informed Decisions
itConsulting.subtitle: Independent technology consulting to help you make informed decisions about your IT infrastructure, systems, and strategy.

footer.description: Reliable IT services for growing businesses. We provide IT support, project management, and consulting services tailored to small and mid-sized businesses.
